txt.en: This strange medallion depicts an antlered helm, encircled by writing in a language with which you are not familiar. The only words you can make out are \qRhi Helvarch.\q\n\nPerhaps one of the Rangers of the Grey Company will be able to decipher it.

'What is this you have found, [placeholder]? I know a little of this language, yes. It is the native Dunlending tongue.

'These words here -- \qRhi Helvarch\q -- mean the Hunter King. I must confess that I have never heard of such a person before. Perhaps it is the title of a local chieftain?

'And this here -- \qGalar-gwig\q -- could be translated as the Mournshaws. I wonder....'
'Did you find anything during your patrol of the Gloomglens?'
You found a medallion inscribed in a language with which you are not familiar.
Talk to a Ranger at Echad Idhrenfair
There are Rangers at Echad Idhrenfair to the south of where you found the medallion.\n\nYou should bring the medallion you found to one of the Rangers of the Grey Company.
